dsense.name: parenthesis
dsense.guideword: US, usually plural (punctuation: round bracket) (标点符号)

example.eg: The author used parentheses to add information to the sentence.
Tracy carefully read every parenthesis in the contract.
example.egtrans: 特雷西仔细阅读了合同中的每个插入语部分。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 插入语, 括号中的文本

example.eg: The speaker couldn't refrain from adding a parenthesis to his speech.
